description: Prune 2 plane trees and five horse chestnut trees in front garden.Works:- Facing the house and looking at trees from left to right.1. Chestnut - Remove branches growing towards the house at old pollards.Shape and balance crown.2. Plane - Remove limb with pollard that is growing towards the house back to main trunk.Same for limb growing over the footpath.Remove branches growing towards the house back to old pollard (one branch from each of two pollards).3. Plane - Remove pollard growing towards house back to main trunk. Inspect for rot if necessary  fell.4. Chestnut - Remove entire limb growing towards house back to trunk. Thin remainder by 20%.Shape and balance crown. For continuation of these Works see informatives.
decision_conditions: The work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendations of British Standard 3998 : 1989 'Tree Work'.
